documents.document: @AnfieldHub Thank fuck
@VintageCoutinho His throw ins would cause all sorts of shit
@NathxnK Don't know Jeff
@DjSelectaSkills Add top class to Clyne Matip Hendo Gini Lallana Mane Firmino Coutinho and were laughing, no more bullshit.
Clyne Matip Henderson Wijnaldum Lallana Mane Firmino Coutinho, there good enough imo, add to that properly and were going places.
@DjSelectaSkills Yep coz we know Hull away will be the test, games we need to start winning
@DjSelectaSkills You anymore confident with how tonight went
The intensity especially 2nd half is what's needed all the time, we all know the problems that need sorting but that was much better tonight
We almost got robbed aswell coz that was never a fucking penalty
After our recent collapse that's much better tonight, obviously a win was needed but you'll take that in the circumstance, much better.
Be on it from the 1st Liverpool, we can beat these cunts.
People actually want Klopp out, get fucking real he's the best thing to happen to us in years.
@DjSelectaSkills Whatever else happened we'll never know but he's apologised, so let the man back in, we're fucking desperate.
@DjSelectaSkills Come on Jurgen, just look at Lovren coz that should be all the motivation you need.
Yes I'm worried and yes I think we need big change in the boardroom and on the pitch, and yes i may be going on but I care about our club.
Time to fix up and be ready for Chelsea
Like I've already said it's times like this you find out who's good enough and surely Klopp will be doing just that.
Cutting a long story short, the majority of the players we have just ain't good enough.
And I'm not naive to know it won't happen overnight but 3 defeats in a row against teams we should be beating is a worry.
You started to believe we were slowly becoming a proper team and finally turning that horrible corner then we hit this bad run......
You knew with it being Klopps 1st full season you'd have a couple of knocks along the way, but with how good weve been up until new year....
@DjSelectaSkills Not like he can play cb or anything
@Musker_LFC @bailey1_nathan Tell this to the players
Klopp may have thought over the short spell last season that he could generally work with the players he had, turns out.....
@AnfieldPulse Its killing us and it needs to change now
@CudiRed @FalseFirmino Just hope Fsg don't put him under pressure and give him money to buy real fucking players
@D10_LFC They weren't saying that in November, and coz we're still fucking shit it's gonna take time again, fucking bollocks mate.
@DjSelectaSkills I'm worried mate, the position we've been put under by Fsg is very concerning, it'll be Klopp who's put under pressure tho.
People say we need a mass clear out in the summer, it should've happened this summer.
@D10_LFC Same here mate and it ain't fucking changed
Not saying we definitely would've won coz were pathetic at the moment, but give yourselves a fucking chance, not good enough all round
Our confidence is shot and you make that many changes, Fsg are the cause for where we're at but Klopps responsible for that shit today.
Time to fucking panic, were in serious trouble.
Boy do we need a boost, let's win today and let's fucking win well.
I hate ranting and being negative but i just want success for our football club, we now have the right manager so let's move forward.
@DjSelectaSkills Majority of our squad don't either, your not playing for Southampton Newcastle or Augsberg now, your playing for Liverpool
@96merseyside @chrislfcslater @AnfieldHQ @LFC Hopefully we see that today
Time to put in a performance that Warrants that fact coz I can't take anymore of this shit weve been accustomed to just accept.
Time for these players to realise your not playing for the shitty clubs we brought you from, your playing for Liverpool football club.
Karius Arnold Gomez Matip Moreno Wijnaldum Henderson Coutinho Origi Firmino Ojo, we need a win no fucking about.
@IndigoLFC Same mate, we can't deal with Lovren no more
@Carl_M79 Having the right players with the right mentality will help, something we lack in abundance.
Next couple of years are massive and we can't fuck up, let's be thankful we have Klopp.
Klopp will get us back and do great things, just not with this group though, time and again the majority just ain't good enough.
@AnfieldRd96 fucking spot on mate, the only players we have that don't bottle it either
So much promise turning to shit its worrying these last few performances just scream of the last few seasons, Klopp needs a rethink and fast
Yet again we dont show up when we need to yet again certain players are fucking shit, although tbf everyone of them were, not good enough.
This boy, and he's ours. https://t.co/9WzPntYy1h
It's players like Mignolet Lovren and at the moment Can who are problems and need to come out of our team, startingâ€¦ https://t.co/2Wv21v7MgG
@NateLFC_ @MattiasArvidss1 Just frustrating that some players make the same mistakes, but with Klopp were on the right track
Time to make sure that shit on Saturday is forgotten and we refocus and are ready for Wednesday, few changes needed to restore confidence.
Its all well and good when your flying it's when your struggling you find out how mentally tough your team are, time to find out who got it.
@ThoseScouseLads Worst cb Ive seen at the club for the money we paid, the cunts like a lost puppy and has the mentality of one.
I may have ranted a bit since yesterday but I just want us to be the best, moments like yesterday make it so fucking frustrating.
Just goes to show how good Klopp is fucking love the guy, we should be thankful we have him to guide us on our way, world class manager.
We have improved under Klopp and the table suggests that and we will get better, but there are players we have that simply aint good enough
Time for Klopp to find out who he can really trust.
We could be struggling in 6th or 10 points clear at the top and I'd still say we have players that will always let you down.
Now we're losing coz we don't have Mane available, nooo we're losing coz certain players we have just don't have the brain to function
@LFCroundup How about at 2-2 you go on and win the game, that shows how good you are, not always having to react after defeat.
@kopice86 Lovren makes me sick, how he's a defender I'll never fucking know
@kopice86 Yep he's joke and how the fuck is it Milner marking Llorrente, where the fuck is Lovren
@VintageCoutinho @klopp Should leave us with about 10 players
@IndigoLFC He's fucking mentally unstable the cunt, thats been clear for ages.
At 2-2 theres only one winner and then yet again we Fuck up ourselves, really is fucking frustrating
@_Est_1980_ Don't think I can handle Lovren anymore mate, oh if there was never a problem with Sakho
Who partners Matip from now then coz I'd probably go with Gomez if I'm being honest, Lovren will never be good enough and Klaven is back up.
@flanners85 All I'm concerned about is us fucking about again, fuck Wayne Rooney.
Best way to react is book a place at Wembley, and we make sure we fucking react well
Defensively we are so pathetic, no toughness at all fucking embarrassing really, look at our defending for the 3rd, not a fucking clue.
Our decision making today has been fucking dogshit, fucking fuming with that out there today, you don't concede 3 at home to Swansea, fuming
Matip can play, what a day this is
Great news about Steven Gerrard, the man is back home where he belongs
Been impressed with what ive seen of Alexander Arnold and Ejaria, future stars for sure.
He's a crack head https://t.co/BQjSddFNjf
We kept a clean sheet with Lucas in our back 4 and he scored a header, got to be some sort of record surely.
Good experience for the young players again, a 1st appearance for Harry Wilson, Ojo looked lively and Lucas got his 1st goal after 7yrs.
That was always gonna be a dodgy fucking game and yeah we didn't play well but we're through and that's all that counts in knockout comps.
So proud to be a red, were moving in the right direction #WeAreLiverpool
@flanners85 Thought he was one of our better performers today
Paul Pogba is just a waste of time
@FFArsenal Fucking state of the bastards
We've got the best https://t.co/gff7Bokvm6
@LFCJosh23 How about we put in a good performance at Old Trafford and got a good point.
Still unbeaten against the top 6 this season and that's not bad at all.
@MrNeale92 Yeah all day United had to win that, would've been been great to hold on but it's a good point and keeps us in good shape.
How impressive was Alexander Arnold aswell and Mignolet too, great to have Hendo and Coutinho back also, much better point for us today.
Yes I wished we held on but it's a good result today in a tough game where we defended very well, we worked our bollocks off today.
Good performance defended well, Mignolet probably kept us in it so happy to take a point even though we were winning, good point taken.
@johnwez01 Ah man, hope all goes well for Alexander Arnold
Been away for a few days sorting a new phone, what's happened to Clyne
The awkward moment when we fuck shit up at old toilet on Sunday, coz we are fucking winning.
Wow Graham Taylor, rest in peace.
Mignolet Lovren Moreno Lucas Can and Sturridge are the only players we have that give me a constant fucking headache, the rest are alright.
@James_Cutting Playing for Liverpool and Klopp, we can all dream.
@James_Cutting I know innit, although that would be lovely
@James_Cutting No its not but were doing well anyway, 2nd in the league challenging and players are coming back, no need for panic.
@James_Cutting People don't want much do they fucking hell, last night the whole team were shit, we do have some out of form though.
@James_Cutting Yeah until he has a bad game then needs to be sold instantly
